hero.title: Trust Without
hero.description: Filter spam, verify reputation, and discover content through your social graph. No blocklists. No gatekeepers.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Start filtering spam and verifying trust in three simple steps.

step1.title: Install Extension
step1.description: Add the WoT Extension to your browser. It automatically connects to your Nostr identity.

step2.title: Build Your Graph
step2.description: The extension indexes your follow list and calculates social distances to other users.

step3.title: Start Filtering
step3.description: Web apps can now query trust scores to filter content, prioritize notifications, and more.

howItWorks.learnMoreLink: Learn more about how Web of Trust works

whyWot.title: Why Web of Trust?
whyWot.description: Leverage your existing social connections to determine who to trust, without relying on centralized authorities.

decentralized.title: Decentralized Filtering
decentralized.description: Your network, your rules. Filter spam based on social distance instead of centralized blocklists that can be censored or manipulated.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Sub-millisecond queries even with millions of users. Our Oracle handles 10,000+ requests per second for real-time filtering.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Choose local-only mode for complete privacy, or use the Oracle for speed. Your data stays under your control.

extension.title: WoT Extension
extension.descriptionStart: A powerful browser extension that exposes the
extension.descriptionEnd: API, enabling any web app to query social distance and trust scores directly.

clientSide.title: Client-side trust queries
clientSide.description: Query trust scores without server roundtrips

mode.title: Local or remote mode
mode.description: Choose privacy or performance based on your needs

privacy.title: Privacy-focused design
privacy.description: Your data never leaves your browser in local mode

oracle.title: WoT Oracle
oracle.description: A high-performance backend service that indexes the entire Nostr follow graph, delivering sub-millisecond trust queries at massive scale.

api.title: Simple REST API
api.description: Easy integration with any backend or frontend

performance.title: 10,000+ queries/second
performance.description: Built for real-time filtering at scale
